Package com.saicone.settings.source

Class YamlSettingsSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.saicone.settings.source.YamlSettingsSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SettingsSource
    public class YamlSettingsSource
extends Object
implements SettingsSource
    A settings source for yaml-formatted data
    This class uses snakeyaml library to read and write any data.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  YamlSettingsSource.PublicConstructor
      Constructor wrapped instance to read java objects from yaml nodes.
      static class  YamlSettingsSource.PublicYaml
      Yaml wrapped instance with public method to get used constructor and representer instances.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      YamlSettingsSource()
      Constructs a yaml settings source with default options.
      This means any comment will be parsed and the data will be written using pretty flow.
      YamlSettingsSource​(@NotNull YamlSettingsSource.PublicYaml yaml)
      Constructs a yaml settings source with provided YamlSettingsSource.PublicYaml wrapped instance.
